resources.string: Quote calculator for estimating Notary services for clients.

Common Discounts: 
 Documents 1-5: See Mobile Quotes 
 Documents 10-20: $5 per page 
 Documents 21-50: $4 per page 
 Documents 50+: $3 per page

Suggestable Mobile Quotes: 
 Medical Documents: $7 per page 
 Legal Documents: $8 per page 
 Personal Documents: $10 per page 
 Mortgage Documents: $6 per page
